comments.content: Marked as new as OP has provided requested info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy

comments.content:
@ash kha:
Your issue sounds a lot like bug 1523889. Please check if you can use Glance 
directly without issues:

    glance --debug image-list

If this works finem but "nova --debug image-list" still doesn't work, it's 
likely that you have a configuration issue in your "/etc/nova/nova.conf" file
(in the "[glance]" section). Please attach your "nova.conf" file here.

When you add your response here, please also specify which version you use.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
